verbose_text: In liver injury, HSC activation is converted to myofibroblast (MFB), which produces a number of growth factors that stimulate extracellular matrix (ECM) deposition through autocrine and paracrine signaling pathways, such as alpha-Smooth muscle actin (alpha-SMA), which ultimately promotes ECM deposition XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR; At the same time, alpha-SMA can be used as a marker protein for HSC proliferation activation.
